      • getRatesByCurrency

        @RequestMapping(value="/exchange")
public java.lang.String getRatesByCurrency(@RequestParam(value="text")
                                                                               java.lang.String text)
                                                                        throws java.text.ParseException
        REST controller can take Date and currencies as input and gives exchange rate as output. Sample - http://ec2-**-**-98-69.compute-1.amazonaws.com:8080/converter/exchange?text=2017-01-01 SGD EUR Supports only 8 currencies
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If an Invalid Date is entered .
